Leadership in Quick Service — Firehouse Subs (Tsawwassen)



Firehouse Subs storefront


Context. Busy lunchtime traffic with strict opening SLAs.
Role. Opening shift lead coordinating prep, food safety checks, and first‑hour throughput.
Actions. - Checklist-driven open (equipment warm-up, line setup, temp checks) - Delegated prep by station; verified labeling & FIFO rotation - Managed front counter & POS, resolved order issues, supported new staff
Outcome. Reliable open, fewer reworks, smoother guest flow at peak.

Rupinder Kaur

A Bit About Me
I am an MBA student at UCW (Vancouver) and an opening shift lead at Firehouse Subs, Tsawwassen. I enjoy fast-paced teamwork, hospitality, and process-driven operations that deliver a great guest experience.





## Highlights - Opening shift lead: execute checklist-driven open, delegate prep, verify food safety & labeling. - Customer-first service: handle POS, resolve issues quickly, and support teammates under pressure. - Reliable and punctual: consistent store readiness before the first lunch rush.


## Quick Stats - Location: Vancouver, BC - Program: MBA at UCW - Current role: Opening Shift Lead, Firehouse Subs (Tsawwassen)

Firehouse Subs, Tsawwassen — Opening Shift Lead
